page.title: 13HOUSES ON SCORAIG
page.content: NEARLY ALL PEOPLE ON SCORAIG HAVE HOUSES MADE OF TORRIDONIAN SANDSTONE, BECAUSE IT IS PLENTIFUL,TRADITIONAL AND PRACTICAL. SOME PEOPLE WERE ABLE TO USE TRADITIONAL CROFT HOUSES BUT OTHERS HAVE REBUILT RUINS AND RE-ROOFED THEM WITH CORRUGATED IRON OR SLATES.MANY HAVE ADDED EXTENSIONS AS THE ORIGINAL HOUSES WERE QUITE SMALL. THE EXTENSIONS ARE OF DIFFRENT DESIGN AND MATERIALS,SUCH AS STONE TIMBER AND CONCRETE.ALL TIMBER HAS TO BE BOUGHT AND FERRIED ACROSS THE LOCH AS DO THE OTHER BUILDING MATERIALS. SEVERAL PEOPLE HAVE BOUGHT SITE HUTS,DEMOLISHED THEM,FERRIED THEM,AND RE-ERECTED THEM AS HOMES OR WORKSHOPS.
